title: Michael Blackson Interview and More
itunes:title: Michael Blackson Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Michael Blackson stop by, and this time around it got a little more personal. He spoke about his stand up, the difficulties raising his son and more Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that killed his wife because of mayo and since it is Freaky Friday we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners feel about "hot butt sex" after Tyler the Creator dropped a freestyle about it. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
